name: R5-AggregationMode-R4-AggregationMode
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 AggregationMode into FHIR R4

element.display: When the resource is in a Bundle, the resource the reference points to will be found in the same bundle as the resource that includes the reference.

target.display: The resource the reference points to will be found in the same bundle as the resource that includes the reference.

element.display: The reference is a local reference to a contained resource.

target.display: The reference is a local reference to a contained resource.

element.display: The reference to a resource that has to be resolved externally to the resource that includes the reference.

target.display: The reference to a resource that has to be resolved externally to the resource that includes the reference.
